abstract: All last week, Wall Street was watching negotiations between Kohlberg Kravis Roberts and a group of big banks to finance the First Data Corporation buyout.
snippet: All last week, Wall Street was watching negotiations between Kohlberg Kravis Roberts and a group of big banks to finance the First Data Corporation buyout.
lead_paragraph: All last week, Wall Street was watching the high-stakes negotiations between Kohlberg Kravis Roberts and a group of big banks led by Citigroup, which must entice investors to buy $24 billion in bonds and loans to finance the First Data Corporation buyout.

headline.main: Some Labor Pains for First Data Deal
headline.print_headline: Some Labor Pains For First Data Deal
